channel.title: Need help with xteleall

item.title: Need help with xteleall
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i really want to know how to make ::xteleall work on devolution 7.0
this is the code i have

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteleall”) && (playerRights > 0)) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client castOn = (client)p;
p.teleportToX = absX;
p.teleportToY = absY;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage("You have been teleported to "
+ playerName);
}
}
